rights.title: Freedom from Discrimination
rights.description: Every person has the right to be free from discrimination on the basis of gender, ethnicity, or background.

rights.title: Right to Education
rights.description: Women and girls have equal rights to education under Ghana's constitution.

faqs.answer: You can report cases of abuse or violence to DOVVSU or the nearest police station.
You have the right to equality, safety, and dignity under Ghana's Constitution and the Domestic Violence Act.
